overview: Director of Administration/Finance, Ronald Dubois, Ph.D. has served as a Director and Treasurer since 1998 and as Secretary since May 2003. Dr. Dubois is Director of Administration/Finance and Chief Financial Officer. Dr. Dubois is one of the companys founders. Previously Dr. Dubois served as the Proposal Manager for the OCI Simulation Systems Division and Deputy Director of the OCI Wireless Communications Division from 1996 to 2001. Prior to joining OCI, Dr. Dubois worked at Chaminade University, Honolulu, Hawaii for ten years as Associate Professor Chemistry/Mathematics and for six years as the Vice President for Finance and Operations.
